body.name: Anthony Glycolic Facial Cleanser for Men – Daily Cleansing Face Wash and Shave Prep – Hydrating, Exfoliating, and Gentle on Sensitive Skin – Non-foaming, 8 Fl. Oz

features: REMOVES DIRT, OIL, AND FLAKING SKIN — Glycolic acid, (natural alpha-hydroxy acid from sugar cane), gives a deep clean, refine and clarify oily pores while exfoliating to control breakouts and brighten up your face. For oily to normal skin.

LIFTS BEARD HAIRS FOR CLOSER SHAVE — Prep for shaving while you cleanse; just wash your face like normal and you’ll get the added bonus of softening and lifting hairs so you can get a kissable-close shave. Soothing chamomile prevents irritation.

KEEPS SKIN HYDRATED, HEALTHY AND CLEAR — A hydrating, non-foaming lotion cleanser with aloe vera and calendula botanical extracts holds in moisture to treat dryness. Vitamins A, C, and E are strong antioxidants that protect against free radicals.

FREE OF ALL THE BAD STUFF — You can’t expect your skin to be healthy if you slather chemicals on it every day. That’s why Anthony’s products are free of parabens, phthalates, GMOs, DEA, and triclosan. Allergy and dermatologist tested. Made cruelty free in the USA.

FAVORITE WITH GROOMING EXPERTS — Anthony brand grooming products for men have been featured (and won awards) in Men’s Health, New York Times, Forbes, GQ, and Esquire. We’re also in 850 high-end barber shops across US and Canada.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First time customer. It's good and effective. Like the large bottle. A bit expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite Face Wash
reviews.reviewText: I've used Clinique for Men over the past couple of years, and I'm extremely impressed with this face wash. It feels like a big step up. I have mildly sensitive skin that is really prone to blackheads, and I felt like most of my past face washes haven't really "deep cleaned" down into my pores. After doing a little reseach, I decided to try a Glycolic Acid face wash. My skin has really improved, and I'm very happy with the product.The first thing that you need to know is that this wash is most likely different than what you're used to. The consistency is almost like a conditioner, and there is no lather. It's deceptive, because we're used to the fact that lather = clean. However, it does an excellent job of stripping the dirt and oil from your skin, and your face feels really clean and fresh afterwards. Like all face washes, you MUST follow with a good moisturizer or else your face is going to feel tight and it will start to create excess oil during the day.It has a pleasant orange/citrus scent, and washes off your face easily.This is now my go-to face wash, and I may even try some other Anthony brand stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Great daily cleanser, I've been using it for 8+ years
reviews.reviewText: I've used Anthony products for a very long time, usually purchased at Nordstrom. For cleansers, I've tried the Algae Cleanser which I love and their orange Facial Scrub (which smells good but for some reason I don't like the feeling I get on my skin from it and I have a full bottle just chillin in the corner). They have both been replaced by the Glycolic Facial Cleanser and I'm a huge fan. It's not the strongest, but it is perfect for daily use.Pros:- Great daily cleanser- End result is feeling clean without drying out your skin- Scent is unbothersome- I appreciate that they are upfront with the glycolic percentage, a lot of brands hide this and it's difficult to find what you need (had difficulties finding something that met my derm's recommendations)Cons:- Can't think of any, wish it was free .99 ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok face wash.
reviews.reviewText: For the price it's an OK face wash. not a "WOW" like the kind of impression I got from the positive reviews. it's somewhat gentle. I like that it washes off easily, because some facial cleansers are hard to wash off, this one comes right off with a splash.. It's probably a 5 star cleanser, I just don't want to jump into conclusions yet. This is the first impression of it.I bought this because it makes more sense to have glycolic acid during cleansing stage and not toning or protecting. And some of their other products just make sense for the skin routine, compared to some other premium and professional care brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I keep coming back to this cleanser! I love the light scent and it doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT or keep wasting ur time on other products
reviews.reviewText: i love this producti have oily skin (7/10) so its quite bad, i have used a number of other cleansers, they worked to get rid if the oil but dried out my skin which still resulted in breaking outas i stumble on to this one by accident, i thought it was kinda expensive just for a cleanser, i hesitated a bit n bought the bottle (thinking if its not good, i can return it, amazon has the best policy for that)to my surprise, this got rid of the oil in my face n some how it felt moisturized as well, it didnt dry my skin at all, it left a cool n soft feeling on my skin, unlike other cleansers made my skin feel tighten up. it really helped to prevent acne n i have one of those combination skin problemsoverall, this product is worth the money (then again, i spent more for proactive, so.....really worth it)would be much better if they can drop a few $ for the price lolBUY IT!!, it works for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have used many cleansers but I always come back to this one. I have sensitive and acne-prone skin and I find this works well for both. At 30 dollars a pop it's pricey but it works wonders. Pro tip: If you put it on and rinse it off immediately you are wasting your money. I usually wet my face with a little water before applying or sometimes apply it directly without water and let it sit on my skin for 10 mins, twice a day and it works wonders. (If you're not used to this, it may burn). If it does start to burn, I would just rinse off each time the burning sensation becomes intolerable but that burn is temporary and will go away as soon as you rinse it off. The acid can't effectively do its job if you just rinse it off, it needs time to penetrate the skin and eat away at the dead skin cells. :)
It does what says i love it so much will buy again for sure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Superb cleanser and great value in this size
reviews.reviewText: Have used this cleanser for a while now. Really good value and really makes my skin look and feel very good without irritation.
È un detergente quasi miracoloso. Le imperfezioni del viso sono di molto ridotte. Io lo uso due volte al giorno mattino e sera. Davvero consigliato!!

I use this cleanser in the morning and really like it. Don't expect it to foam up like other cleansers though. It's like a cream consistency (no bubbles). With long term use though, it keeps my adult acne in check...and leaves my skin smooth and soft. I alternate this product with another brand of cleanser as well....I find that my skin gets used to a product and it becomes less effacious.....This is why I will use one bottle of this product ...switch to my other brand....and then come back to this.....It's a product I buy on a regular basis..... highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 30, 2014
reviews.reviewText: Wow, only been using this product a matter of days, I have suffered with severe cystic acne on my forehead for a long long time now, I had tried everything, I have more bad than good weeks these days, it really does affect you on a daily basis when they are so red inflamed and obvious for all to see. I didn't hold out much hope as with all other products I've tried, but in a matter of days my forehead cysts have completely flattened and the skin surrounding them is healing very nicely too, the smell is good, and my skin feels so soft after using it. I am 22 year old male, in case that helps anyone else who wishes to use this product too. If you suffer with any form of acne I suggest at the very least you give it a go, I'm so glad I did, I've already ordered and received my second bottle and I'm only a few days into using the first one.
